Title: The Rescuers Down Under
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Crime, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Mystery
Writer: Jim Cox (animation screenplay by), Karey Kirkpatrick (animation screenplay by), Byron Simpson (animation screenplay by), Joe Ranft (animation screenplay by), Joe Ranft (story supervisor), Margery Sharp (suggested by characters created by)
Actors: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, John Candy, Tristan Rogers
Plot: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.
